net.floodlightcontroller.core

接口 IHAListener

  • 所有超级接口:
    IListener<HAListenerTypeMarker>
    所有已知实现类:
    DeviceManagerImpl.HAListenerDelegate, OFSwitchManager

    public interface IHAListener
extends IListener<HAListenerTypeMarker>
    Listener interface for the HARole of the local controller. Listeners are notified when the controller transitions to role HARole.ACTIVE.

    NOTE: The floodlight platform currently does not support a transition to the STANDBY role.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 net.floodlightcontroller.core.IListener

        IListener.Command

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void controllerNodeIPsChanged(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> curControllerNodeIPs, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> addedControllerNodeIPs, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> removedControllerNodeIPs)
      Gets called when the IP addresses of the controller nodes in the controller cluster change.
      void transitionToActive()
      This notification is fired if the controller's initial role was STANDBY and the controller is now transitioning to ACTIVE.
      void transitionToStandby()
      This notification is fired if the controller's initial role was ACTIVE and the controller is now transitioning to STANDBY.

      • 从接口继承的方法 net.floodlightcontroller.core.IListener

        getName, isCallbackOrderingPostreq, isCallbackOrderingPrereq

    • 方法详细资料

      • transitionToActive

        void transitionToActive()
        This notification is fired if the controller's initial role was STANDBY and the controller is now transitioning to ACTIVE. Clients can query the current (and initial) role from IFloodlightProviderService.getRole() (in startup).

      • transitionToStandby

        void transitionToStandby()
        This notification is fired if the controller's initial role was ACTIVE and the controller is now transitioning to STANDBY. NOTE: The floodlight platform currently terminates after the transition to STANDBY. Clients should prepare for the shutdown in transitionToStandby (e.g., ensure that current updates to operational states are fully synced).

      • controllerNodeIPsChanged

        void controllerNodeIPsChanged(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> curControllerNodeIPs,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> addedControllerNodeIPs,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> removedControllerNodeIPs)
        Gets called when the IP addresses of the controller nodes in the controller cluster change. All parameters map controller ID to the controller's IP.
        参数:
        curControllerNodeIPs -
        addedControllerNodeIPs -
        removedControllerNodeIPs -
